oop.tema3.engine

Interface BorderStrategyInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BorderedStrategy, BorderlessStrategy

    public interface BorderStrategyInterface
    Author:
    RobertPC Interface used to describe the strategy used for the cells on the border of the array.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void resolveCollision(Cell[][] cells, Cell[][] nextGeneration, int i, int j) 

    • Method Detail

      • resolveCollision

        void resolveCollision(Cell[][] cells,
                    Cell[][] nextGeneration,
                    int i,
                    int j)
        Parameters:
        cells - cells the array of Cells that exist in the game.
        nextGeneration - array off Cell units that describes the layout in the next generation
        i - the line in the array of the cell to be analyzed
        j - the column in the array of the cell to be analyzed
